predicate.note: Frames file for 'fate' based on frame for 'destine,' sentence from ECTB. No VerbNet entry.

example.name: passive
example.text: What *T* is unwilling or unable * to make money is fated * to have a small audience or even die out altogether.
example.arg: What *T* is unwilling or unable * to make money
* to have a small audience or even die out altogether
